unnormalised: My grandma, Lakshmi Amma, swore by Ayurvedic treatments. Remember that time she had terrible knee pain during Diwali season? A week at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala with *Pizhichil* and *Navarakizhi* sorted her right out. She walked 2 km every day after that! The doctor there even adjusted her diet; less ghee, more rasam. Cost around Rs. 10,000, but worth every paisa. Now, at 85, she's still making the best Onam Sadhya!
